meanings.definition: Captions displayed at the bottom of a movie or television screen that translate or transcribe the dialogue.
meanings.sent1: The subtitles helped me understand the foreign film better.
meanings.sent2: I always prefer watching movies with subtitles to catch every word.
meanings.sent3: The subtitles on the screen made the characters look like they were talking to me directly.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes darted to the subtitles at the bottom of the screen, trying to keep up with the fast dialogue.
meanings.sent5: The subtitles were like a secret code revealing the hidden meanings of the movie.
